name: Jumps (itch)
description:
Jumps faces you with 47 challenging parkour stages for you to complete! Jump on different blocks and learn their special effects GAMEPLAY

You need to get to the end of each stage by jumping on different colored blocks that have special effects! Some make you jump higher, some make you run faster, and more!

FEATURES
  • 47 challenging stages for you to complete!
  • Extra challenges for those who likes to be challenged!
Q&A

Q: Is the music copyright free?
Q: Yes, the music is copyright free. The music was created by Kevin MacLeod and Teknoaxe. The tracks used are licensed under Creative Commons.
Q: Will there be future updates?
A: No. Only bug fixes from now on.
Q: Can I make custom stages?
A: Unfortunately you can't. The level editor that we used to make this game is quite unstable, and it would be too much work to make it user-friendly.

MISCELLANEOUS INFO

We would like to make this very clear. We did NOT come up with this concept. The concept was created by SuperTrinity for their Minecraft map, 60 Jumps. We basically just used their concept and made a standalone game out of that. We are in no way associated with SuperTrinity and their project.
